snippet.title: JUMPING JACK (ZX SPECTRUM - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Jumping Jack (un-emulated) for the zx spectrum, a true classic from the golden era of spectrum gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1983

Jeeeeez,...one of the most frustrating games EVER, not because It's bad, quite the contrary,...It's a classic but bloody hell It's hell sometimes lol.
Guide Jack up the screen through the gaps whilst running away from the many baddies, but beware, if you don't jump through the gaps at the right moment you will bump your head and collapse in a dizzy spell and risk continuosly falling down the gaps to the bottom only to start again.
20 levels in total but I doubt you'll get passed level 4 without magical pokes.
For this longplay I had to use an invincibility poke, a no falling poke and a no dizzy poke to stop me falling in a dizzy heap to produce this unemulated longplay,...just too damn hard without them.

I hope all you Spectrum fans enjoy this upload.

A huge thanks goes out to "PGYURI" & "GREW" from the WOS forums for producing the magical pokes I needed and how to input them as they were in a non-decimal format,...thanks guys!

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Spectrum and it's cool games alive!!!
